default.400: The input cannot be processed correctly by the server. Please check the format of your input.
default.401: The username and the password are not correct. Please sign in again.
default.404: The search returned no results. Please check your input.
default.500: It is an internal error on the server. Please repeat the process.
default.502: There was an error when forwarding the request to the service. Please repeat the action.
default.unknownCode: An unknown mistake occurred: {{statusCode}}. Please send this error message to the Backoffice team.
default.timeout: The request was canceled because it took too long. Please start the action again.
